Article.ArticleTitle: Comment on "Disclosing Cyclic(Alkyl)(Amino)Carbenes as a One-Electron Reductant: Synthesis of Acyclic(Amino)(Aryl)Carbene-Based Kekulé Diradicaloids".

AbstractText: This correspondence addresses a misassignment of an EPR spectrum of 2 in a recent publication (Chem. Eur. J. 2022, 28, e202104567) by Dr. Jana and co-workers. The original authors have prepared this correspondence together with Dr. Korth.
